short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension checks links by fetching their heads. Icon made by Vectors Market from www.flaticon.com.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check for dead links with a simple click and drag, all links in the selection will be checked, and the dead ones will turn red.
